subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova crushed No. 1 Amélie Mauresmo, 6-0, 4-6, 6-0, to advance to Saturday night's prime-time United States Open final against Belgium’s Justine Henin-Hardenne.
snippet: Maria Sharapova crushed No. 1 Amélie Mauresmo, 6-0, 4-6, 6-0, to advance to Saturday night's prime-time United States Open final against Belgium’s Justine Henin-Hardenne.
